flawed_nl_solution:
Jerome rides a total of 12 x 12 = <<12*12=144>>144 miles in 12 days.
So, he will ride 150 - 144 = <<150-144=11>>11 miles on the 13th day to finish his goal.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
